snippet: KESSLER--Emanuel, Esq. The Officers, Directors, Members and Staff of the Bronx County Bar Association deeply mourn the passing of our distinguished former President and extend our sympathy to his family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KESSLER--Emanuel, Esq. The Officers, Directors, Members and Staff of the Bronx County Bar Association deeply mourn the passing of our distinguished former President and extend our sympathy to his family. 1/3
